title: Bespoke basics: would you pay £160 for this T-shirt?
description: Sunspel, the upmarket basics menswear company who put James Bond and Brad Pitt in luxury tees, have launched a bespoke service for men and womenThe T-shirt is white with a soft, almost cosy feel. It’s heavy, too. Made from mid-weight Supima brushed cotton, it has a crew neck, subtle stitching, slim elbow-length sleeves and sits slightly below the hip. It’s comfy and fits perfectly. It’s also a white T-shirt. And who in their right mind would pay £160 for something they may spill coffee down?This season, Sunspel – the upmarket basics menswear company who put James Bond, Brad Pitt and the dad in Paddington 2 in luxury tees – have launched a bespoke T-shirt service for men and women. Customers are measured and quizzed on tweaks – you can change the fabric, the stitching, arm and hip lengths. It takes about a month from start to finish, and is made by one woman in Sunspel’s Long Eaton factory. Continue reading...
author: Morwenna Ferrier

title: Primers: 10 of the best
description: Don’t write them off as just another step in your routine: primers can make a huge difference to whatever goes on topI never really thought that primers would form a significant part of my makeup ritual. For me, primers were simply another step I just didn’t have time for. And so I skipped it. To my peril. What I have long realised is that a decent primer is imperative to the (quality) finish of your makeup. It creates an even, blurring and hydrating base for everything that follows. This means, fundamentally, you avoid everything on your face sliding around before you’ve made it down the street. Putting on makeup without a primer is a bit like painting over layers of wallpaper. You think it looks OK. Then you compare it to a wall that has been skimmed, cleaned and primed before being painted. And you get an aha moment. There’s no comparing the two. However, I do understand why, aside from the time factor, tons of people don’t use primers. Historically, the textures and formulations have been a bit gunky and ironically just didn’t work well with foundations, leaving a piling effect. These days the choice is better and much more wide-ranging – textures (powders, sprays, balms) and also finishes, to meet all needs (blurring, mattifying, glowing). Which means you no longer need to worry about your primer making your face look like a bobbly old jumper.1. Refy Blur and Hydrate Primer £24, refybeauty.com 2. Dr Jart+ Pore Remedy Smoothing Primer £31, boots.com 3. Milk Make Up Hydro Grip Primer £35, sephora.co.uk 4. Shiseido Revitalessence Skin Glow Primer £39, shiseido.co.uk 5. Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base £40.50, bobbibrown.co.uk 6. Hourglass Vanish Airbrush Primer £55, hourglasscosmetics.co.uk 7. Tatcha Liquid Silk Canvas Primer £51, spacenk.com 8. Merit Great Skin Priming Moisturiser £40, meritbeauty.com 9. E.L.F Power Grip Primer £10, elfcosmetics.com 10. Il Makiage No Filter Poreless Base Smoothing Primer, £42, ilmakiage.com Continue reading...

title: The Best Free People Gifts You Can Still Get Before The Holidays
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.Without fail, every holiday season, you have a few hard-to-shop-for folks — the ones with very specific tastes and interests, from the mom who wants nothing to the hard-to-please Gen Z friend — on your gift list. But also without fail, Free People’s Gift Shop saves the day: The edit is packed with picks for everyone from the passionate yogi and the cozy homebody to the hostess with the mostest and the doting pet parent. Since we know gifting can feel overwhelming, with endless options available and those looming shipping deadlines, we’ve scoped out Free People’s new arrivals and Gift Shop to curate a list of the best products for every giftee. From under-$50 finds (like candles and scarves) to splurge-worthy picks (like the retailer’s excellent bundles), read on to uncover presents that fit your budget and are guaranteed to spark a squeal on unwrapping day. If you’re hoping for free shipping and a quick turnaround, you’ll have to order your Free People gifts by the end of day on December 18 to have them arrive on December 24 — just in time for Christmas day and the start of Hannukah.  DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Fashion Trendsetter If your giftee is devoted to following the latest trends, you’re in the right place: Free People has editor- and reader-favorite barrel-leg jeans, festive oversized scarves, and bag charms — all of which will put a smile their face. DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Holiday Fanatic Does your giftee deck the halls like it’s a sport? Well, then, Free People’s holiday decor is their happy place, filled with quirky ornaments and artisanal tree skirts to add to their festive collection. There’s even a bundle to make their wrapping and gift-giving even more joyous. DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Cozy Homebody Free People has several gift bundles for the homebody, like the sleep set above. There’s also a $248 bundle that’s giving Cameron Diaz in The Holiday, and a $500 one that’ll keep them cozy when they have to leave the house. The retailer also has loungewear sets and cozy slippers to elevate your giftee’s at-home style, without putting a strain on your wallet. DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Host With The Most Every group has a Monica Geller, the one who assembles the perfect charcuterie board and has catalog-worthy decor. Show your appreciation with a gift as detail-oriented as they are, like a playful candle, chic fabric napkins, or a conversation-starting match cloche. These are also great for your holiday dinner hosts or that hard-to-shop-for mother-in-law. DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Zen-Obsessed Yogi If your yoga-loving friend seems stuck in a black leggings rut, gift them a fresh workout set or onesie to enhance their flow. You could also go all-out with the yogi-approved bundle, which includes vibrant leggings, a bold sports bra, cozy layering top, and much more. If you want to skip the guesswork on sizing, FP Movement has accessories like gym bags and yoga blocks that’ll take their practice to the next level. DashDividers_1_500x100 Free People Gifts For The Adoring Pet Parent Who deserves gifts the most? Fur babies. For friends who treat their cats and dogs like children, Free People’s array of pet apparel, accessories, and toys is downright adorable. Shop all Free People gifts Like what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?Under-$100 FP Movement Gifts You Can Still GrabOne Day Left To Get Coach Outlet Gifts In Time29 On-Sale Nordstrom Gifts That’ll Arrive In Time
author: Vivien Lee

title: Reformation’s Winter Sale Is Back — And Up To 50%
description: .disclaimer{width:90%;margin-bottom:1rem}.disclaimer__lines{width:100%;margin:0 auto;border-bottom:1px solid #999;padding:0;max-width:150px}.disclaimer__copy{width:100%;max-width:355px;font-family:Brown Regular,sans-serif;font-size:.9rem;font-weight:300;line-height:1.3em;color:#333;padding:0 0 .4rem;margin:1rem auto;text-align:center} All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. What better way to celebrate the chilly season than with the beloved winter Reformation sale? The reader-favorite dress destination’s biggest markdown event has arrived with a bang: For a limited time, score up to 50% off select styles, from luxe holiday dresses and skirts to polished pants and cozy cardigans (both of which are s’cute for the office or a dinner date). These discounts demand the online equivalent of an awkward, arms-flailing speed walk — scrolling with purpose and maybe a little panic. So, get moving and scoop up favorites fast. The cutest ‘fits won’t wait, and neither should you. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Sweaters From oversized cashmere polos to a scarf-adorned crewneck, Reformation’s knits deliver in quality and trend appeal. Secure your cozy winter favorites before they’re gone for good. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Dresses It wouldn’t be a Reformation sale without marked-down dresses. Think of it as a treasure trove of minis, midis, and maxis, from shimmering, party-ready gowns to fitted sweater styles perfect for casual plans. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Coats & Jackets Timeless wool coats, ladylike jackets, quiet luxury toppers: Reformation’s on-sale outerwear selection is filled with modern classics. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Tops & Tees Reformation does silky boho blouses and second-skin tops with asymmetrical details like no other. Its on-sale edit is all about transitional statement pieces — great to layer under a jacket by day and wear solo with sculptural earrings for date night. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Pants & Skirts Bold red silk pants are a seasonal “It” item, but you can also find slouchy tailored trousers, bubble skirts, and a fringe-sequin mini (screaming New Year’s Eve) at the Reformation sale. Dial them up for a party or temper with a chunky knit and flats for the office. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Denim There’s no such thing as too much denim — especially from Reformation. The sale is stacked with fresh takes on the classics, from black and dark indigo washes to bomber-style jackets and the sleekest mini dress for a prim edge. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 40% Off Reformation Shoes Take your pick from Reformation’s on-sale shoe lineup, where trends and timelessness meet. Ballet flats, slingbacks, kitten heels, and knee-high boots (in a delectable espresso brown) are all here — the finishing touch for any winter look. DashDividers_1_500x100 Up To 50% Off Reformation Bags Reformation’s on-sale bags are seriously good. You have supple leather buckets with the perfect slouch, the cutest suede satchel in trending grey, a rhinestone-adorned mesh mini made for party nights, and a ‘90s-inspired snake-print shoulder bag that goes with everything.  DashDividers_1_500x100 For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter. author: Mercedes Viera

title: The 15 Most Comfortable Walking Shoes
description: Having comfortable walking shoes incorporated into your wardrobe is a no-brainer, especially if you travel regularly or have an unbearably long commute to the office. When shopping for the best walking shoes, it's important to look for pairs that are versatile enough to keep you feeling both supported and chic, regardless of where your day takes you. We find that fashionable walking shoes are the perfect happy medium, because they not only look good with all of your favorite outfits, but they're also the exact type of shoe we want to slip into for a concert or when we're out exploring a new city. Alternatively, if you love to take long walks around the neighborhood or to your local coffee shop, it's essential that you have a great pair of stylish walking shoes on hand. It's not always easy to find the best of both worlds with style and comfort, but we're here to make it possible. Ahead, we rounded up the most comfortable walking shoes that'll look great with all your outfits, from sleek trousers to stretchy, sculpting leggings - and they'll also give your feet the support they need for long excursions. Whether you're looking for the best sneakers for walking, are in the market for a pair of classic white sneakers, or simply want to stock up on good shoes for walking all day, we have no doubt you'll be able to find your new favorite wardrobe essential here. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best shoes for walking and standing all day. These comfortable walking shoes are options you'll want to slip into time and time again.
author: Kyley Warren

title: 14 Comfortable Work Shoes For the Office and Beyond
description: When finding the perfect pair of work shoes, style ranks high on our wish lists but, naturally, so does comfort. From the subway to the office to after-work cocktails with your friends and beyond, these are the shoes you'll practically be living in daily, so it's important to shop for a pair that'll keep you feeling comfortable, supported, and chic. Ahead, we curated a list of this season's best and most comfortable work shoes for women, from slingback heels and black flats to business-casual shoes that can meet any office's dress-code requirements. Most importantly, they all have one thing in common: they'll become your go-to everyday pair. Depending on your job or daily journey, your comfort (and commute) requirements might have different needs. If you work in a more dressed-up environment with a walking commute, opt for classic, comfortable flats that you can wear with trousers. If your workplace is more casual and you drive, you can probably get away with wearing a pair of heels to spice things up. And, of course, we also made sure to include some versatile sneakers that pair well with all clothing items - and are even favorites of our own editors. Keep reading for our complete guide to the best women's work shoes. With styles from brands like Old Navy, Rothy's, and Everlane, there's something at every price point and markdown. Find your favorites and shop this season's best comfortable work shoes for standing all day.
